00009 class ORAD3511ADCDecoder : public ORVHistDecoder, public ORVBasicRDTreeDecoder
00010 {
00011   public:
00012     enum EAD3511ADCConsts { kNCards = 32 };
00013 
00014     ORAD3511ADCDecoder() {}
00015     virtual ~ORAD3511ADCDecoder() {}
00016 
00017     virtual void Swap(UInt_t* dataRecord);
00018     /* Handling the correct swapping for this record. */
00019     virtual inline bool HasReferenceDate(UInt_t* record)
00020       { return bool(record[1] & 0x02000000); }
00021     virtual inline size_t GetNADCValues(UInt_t* record)
00022       { return HasReferenceDate(record) ? LengthOf(record) - 4 : LengthOf(record) - 2; }
00023     virtual inline UInt_t IthADCValueOf(UInt_t* record, size_t i)
00024       { return HasReferenceDate(record) ? record[4+i] : record[2+i]; }
00025     virtual double ReferenceDateOf(UInt_t* record);
00026 
00027     // for histograms
00028     virtual std::string GetHistName(int iHist);
00029     virtual std::string GetHistTitle(int iHist);
00030     virtual std::string GetXTitle() { return "ADC Value"; }
00031     virtual size_t GetNbinsX() { return 0xfff+1; }
00032     virtual double GetXLo() { return -0.5; }
00033     virtual double GetXHi() { return double(0xfff) + 0.5; }
00034 
00035     virtual int GetHistIndex(UInt_t* record);
00036     virtual double GetX(UInt_t* record, size_t i) { return double(IthADCValueOf(record, i)); }
00037 
00038     // for basic trees
00039     virtual size_t GetNPars() { return 3; }
00040     virtual std::string GetParName(size_t iPar);
00041     virtual size_t GetNRows(UInt_t* record) { return GetNADCValues(record); }
00042     virtual UInt_t GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t iRow);
00043 
00044     virtual std::string GetDataObjectPath() { return "ORAD3511Model:ADC"; }
00045 };
